item.title: Destiny add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you feel in your heart to be right – for you’ll be criticized anyway." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Laurel Thatcher Ulrich
item.description: "Well-behaved women seldom make history." -- Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Work is always an antidote to depression." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "Keep your face to the sun and you will never see the shadows." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "Never bend your head. Hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Bill Gates
item.description: "As we look ahead into the next century, leaders will be those who empower others." -- Bill Gates

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Warren Buffett
item.description: "The most important thing to do if you find yourself in a hole is to stop digging." -- Warren Buffett

item.title: Destiny add a quote by John F. Kennedy
item.description: "Forgive your enemies, but never forget their names." -- John F. Kennedy

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Dale Carnegie
item.description: "People rarely succeed unless they have fun in what they are doing." -- Dale Carnegie

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Dale Carnegie
item.description: "Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all." -- Dale Carnegie

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Dale Carnegie
item.description: "Don't be afraid of enemies who attack you. Be afraid of the friends who flatter you." -- Dale Carnegie

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Andrew Carnegie
item.description: "People who are unable to motivate themselves must be content with mediocrity, no matter how impressive their other talents." -- Andrew Carnegie

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "If you can make a woman laugh, you can make her do anything." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Dogs never bite me. Just humans." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Who said nights were for sleep?" -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "It's all make believe, isn't it?" -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I am good, but not an angel. I do sin, but I am not the devil. I am just a small girl in a big world trying to find someone to love." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "The nicest thing for me is sleep, then at least I can dream." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Destiny add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Stories of imagination tend to upset those without one." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "Turn your wounds into wisdom." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "Writing is like sex. First you do it for love, then you do it for your friends, and then you do it for money." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "Is sex dirty? Only when it's being done right." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Destiny add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Good sex is like good bridge. If you don't have a good partner, you'd better have a good hand." -- Mae West
